item.title: Poop on the road., 25th July
item.description:
An individual was spotted pooping on the street. This is a safety hazard for residents, specifically kids who may accidentally step in it. Please can you have this cleaned ASAP.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kenmure Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Bollard on the corner of Blomfield Road and Warwick Place, 25th July
item.description:
A truck has again damaged a Bollard at the corner of Warwick Place and Blomfield Road. As you can see from your files, this has happened on numerous occasions. We request that Westminster immediately repairs the Bollard. In the past, we have also had damage to our private property as a damaged Bollard leaves us exposed to passing vehicles. Please attend to the issue ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warwick Place, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches, 25th July
item.description:
Someone has hacked at the tree outside 90 Newlands park and left all the branches piled up on the pavement, please can we have them removed, this tree is a problem and has been reported several times over the last few years as it overgrows and blocks the pathway hindering passers by and the disabled, it’s even been reported to the mayor and local mp.someone has now taken it into ther own hands to solve the problem that the council are ignoring
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 151, Newlands Park, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet
